custom-sql.sql: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT DLFileEntry.fileEntryId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM DLFileEntry INNER JOIN DLFileVersion ON (DLFileVersion.fileEntryId = DLFileEntry.fileEntryId) WHERE (CAST_TEXT(DLFileEntry.extraSettings) != '') OR (CAST_TEXT(DLFileVersion.extraSettings) != '')
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT DLFileEntry.fileEntryId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM DLFileEntry [$JOIN$] WHERE (DLFileEntry.groupId = ?) AND ([$STATUS$]) AND [$FOLDER_ID$]

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT DLFileEntry.fileEntryId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM DLFileEntry INNER JOIN DLFileVersion ON (DLFileVersion.fileEntryId = DLFileEntry.fileEntryId) WHERE (DLFileVersion.groupId = ?) AND (DLFileVersion.userId = ?) AND ([$STATUS$]) AND [$FOLDER_ID$]
SELECT {DLFileEntry.*} FROM DLFileEntry WHERE (DLFileEntry.smallImageId = ?) OR (DLFileEntry.largeImageId = ?) OR (DLFileEntry.custom1ImageId = ?) OR (DLFileEntry.custom2ImageId = ?)
SELECT {DLFileEntry.*} FROM DLFileEntry WHERE (DLFileEntry.fileEntryTypeId IN ( SELECT DLFileEntryTypes_DDMStructures.fileEntryTypeId FROM DLFileEntryTypes_DDMStructures WHERE [$DDM_STRUCTURE_ID$] ))

SELECT {DLFileEntry.*} FROM DLFileEntry WHERE (fileEntryId NOT IN ( SELECT DLFileVersion.fileEntryId FROM DLFileVersion WHERE (DLFileVersion.fileEntryId = DLFileEntry.fileEntryId) AND (DLFileVersion.version = DLFileEntry.version) ))
SELECT {DLFileEntry.*} FROM DLFileEntry WHERE (fileEntryId NOT IN ( SELECT classPK FROM AssetEntry WHERE classNameId = [$CLASS_NAME_ID_COM.LIFERAY.PORTLET.DOCUMENTLIBRARY.MODEL.DLFILEENTRY$] ))

SELECT DISTINCT {DLFileEntry.*} FROM DLFileEntry INNER JOIN DLFileVersion ON (DLFileVersion.fileEntryId = DLFileEntry.fileEntryId) WHERE (CAST_TEXT(DLFileEntry.extraSettings) != '') OR (CAST_TEXT(DLFileVersion.extraSettings) != '') ORDER BY DLFileEntry.modifiedDate DESC
SELECT {DLFileEntry.*} FROM DLFileEntry WHERE (groupId NOT IN ( SELECT DISTINCT groupId FROM Group_ ))

SELECT {DLFileEntry.*} FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT DLFileEntry.fileEntryId FROM DLFileEntry [$JOIN$] WHERE (DLFileEntry.groupId = ?) AND ([$STATUS$]) AND [$FOLDER_ID$] ) TEMP_TABLE INNER JOIN DLFileEntry ON TEMP_TABLE.fileEntryId = DLFileEntry.fileEntryId

SELECT {DLFileEntry.*} FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT DLFileEntry.fileEntryId FROM DLFileEntry INNER JOIN DLFileVersion ON (DLFileVersion.fileEntryId = DLFileEntry.fileEntryId) WHERE (DLFileVersion.groupId = ?) AND (DLFileVersion.userId = ?) AND ([$STATUS$]) AND [$FOLDER_ID$] ) TEMP_TABLE INNER JOIN DLFileEntry ON TEMP_TABLE.fileEntryId = DLFileEntry.fileEntryId

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT fileEntryTypeId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM DLFileEntryType WHERE [$WHERE$] ( (companyId = ?) AND [$GROUP_ID$] ( (lower(name) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (description LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) ) )

SELECT {DLFileEntryType.*} FROM DLFileEntryType WHERE [$WHERE$] ( (companyId = ?) AND [$GROUP_ID$] ( (lower(name) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (description LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) ) ) ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT groupId, userId FROM DLFileRank GROUP BY groupId, userId HAVING COUNT(*) > ?
SELECT {DLFileRank.*} FROM DLFileRank INNER JOIN DLFileEntry ON (DLFileEntry.fileEntryId = DLFileRank.fileEntryId) WHERE (DLFileEntry.folderId = ?)

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT folderId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM DLFolder WHERE (DLFolder.groupId = ?) AND (DLFolder.mountPoint = ?) AND (DLFolder.hidden_ = [$FALSE$]) AND ([$STATUS$]) AND [$FOLDER_PARENT_FOLDER_ID$]
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT DLFileVersion.fileEntryId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM DLFileVersion WHERE (DLFileVersion.groupId = ?) AND ([$STATUS$]) AND [$FILE_VERSION_FOLDER_ID$]
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT fileShortcutId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM DLFileShortcut [$JOIN$] WHERE (DLFileShortcut.groupId = ?) AND (DLFileShortcut.active_ = ?) AND ([$STATUS$]) AND [$FILE_SHORTCUT_FOLDER_ID$]
SELECT {DLFolder.*} FROM DLFolder WHERE (folderId NOT IN ( SELECT classPK FROM AssetEntry WHERE classNameId = [$CLASS_NAME_ID_COM.LIFERAY.PORTLET.DOCUMENTLIBRARY.MODEL.DLFOLDER$] ))

SELECT DISTINCT folderId AS modelFolderId, DLFolder.createDate as createDate, DLFolder.modifiedDate as modifiedDate, DLFolder.name AS name, DLFolder.name AS title, 0 AS size_, 0 AS readCount, 0 AS fileShortcutId, 1 AS modelFolder FROM DLFolder WHERE (DLFolder.groupId = ?) AND (DLFolder.mountPoint = ?) AND (DLFolder.hidden_ = [$FALSE$]) AND ([$STATUS$]) AND [$FOLDER_PARENT_FOLDER_ID$]

SELECT DISTINCT DLFileEntry.folderId AS modelFolderId, DLFileEntry.createDate as createDate, DLFileEntry.modifiedDate as modifiedDate, DLFileEntry.name AS name, DLFileEntry.title AS title, DLFileEntry.size_ AS size_, DLFileEntry.readCount AS readCount, 0 AS fileShortcutId, 0 AS modelFolder FROM DLFileEntry [$JOIN$] WHERE (DLFileEntry.groupId = ?) AND ([$STATUS$]) AND [$FILE_ENTRY_FOLDER_ID$]

SELECT DISTINCT DLFileEntry.folderId AS modelFolderId, DLFileEntry.createDate as createDate, DLFileEntry.modifiedDate as modifiedDate, DLFileEntry.name AS name, DLFileEntry.title AS title, DLFileEntry.size_ AS size_, DLFileEntry.readCount AS readCount, fileShortcutId AS fileShortcutId, 0 AS modelFolder FROM DLFileShortcut INNER JOIN DLFileEntry ON (DLFileEntry.fileEntryId = DLFileShortcut.toFileEntryId) WHERE (DLFileShortcut.groupId = ?) AND (DLFileShortcut.active_ = ?) AND ([$STATUS$]) AND [$FILE_SHORTCUT_FOLDER_ID$]
INNER JOIN DLFileVersion ON (DLFileEntry.fileEntryId = DLFileVersion.fileEntryId)
INNER JOIN DLFileEntry ON (DLFileEntry.fileEntryId = DLFileShortcut.toFileEntryId)
